issue.title: [C++] Add helper data struct with methods for reading a validity bitmap possibly having a non-zero offset
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1523](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1523). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We're currently doing this using macros, but having a struct data structure with methods would may have the same performance (we should benchmark!) and more readable code
